commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hello to all of you prospective students and your parents and guardians! We are the School Idol Club.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: School idols carry out their activities at their respective schools. We at Nijigasaki High School do so as part of the school idol club here.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: While we have not been active for very long, we work just as hard as any other club, and all of us love school idols.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Daily practice can be tough at times, but gradually seeing the results of your hard work makes it very satisfying.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Working towards a common goal with your fellow members who possess the same dream as you is an emotional experience that cannot be had through study alone.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I am truly glad I joined this club.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: There are tryouts for the club, but only to give us an idea of your skills. We respect everyone's desires and warmly welcome all applicants.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Nijigasaki is a great school. Come enroll in this school, join our club, and create wonderful memories together with us!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Isn't the speech I helped her write awesome?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, and Ayumu was very charismatic giving her speech as well!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: All that's left is for her live show to be a success.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I don't know why, but I'm starting to get nervous myself.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's okay. Ayumu won't let us down. Look, she's starting!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I would like to take this opportunity on stage today to perform a song. Please listen to my song, "Yume e no Ippo."

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Whooooa! Don't Ayumu's dance moves seem more elegant than usual to you?!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes! This is an excellent start!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: She's performing better than she ever has before.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: It must be nice to sing so effortlessly like that!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We'll sing our hearts out at the School Idol Festival to make up for not being able to sing today!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Indeed! Until then, we must practice as hard as we can so as not to lose to Ayumu.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I can't sit still! I just want the School Idol Festival to happen already so I can sing!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Uehara...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The audience will see you if you lean any further forward, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Oh! Sorry.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Chuckle* You were pretty focused on watching the performance, huh?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I-I would not say that at all.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh reeeeeally, Shio-ti? It sure looked like you had your eyes glued to Ayumu!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You can get a better view over here, Shioriko! Come!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: While it does not really matter to me... Thank you very much, Osaka.

commands.speaker: Middle Schooler D
commands.line: That live show just now was awesome!

commands.speaker: Middle Schooler E
commands.line: Yeah! It was my first time seeing a school idol perform, and I got kinda emotional!

commands.speaker: Middle Schooler D
commands.line: This school seems pretty fun. I might put it down as my first preference.

commands.speaker: Middle Schooler E
commands.line: I was thinking about doing that, too!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Chuckle* Looks like it was a huge success.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Anyone would want to join the club after seeing an amazing live show like that.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Everyone got so into it. The heated-up atmosphere was incredible.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You sure have grown a lot to manage to get even me all fired up, Ayumu!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Now I wanna go out and sing, too!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thanks guys. I'm glad to hear that...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: All of our praise and the things those middle schoolers said are the truth. That's how fantastic your performance was. You shouldn't be embarrassed; you should be proud!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You know what? There's just something about Ayumu. She's got this mysterious charm about her that makes me want to cheer her on.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: I totally agree! I can't look away from her for some reason.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: It looks like the number of people who want to support both Ayumu and all of the Nijigasaki girls will just keep growing from here on out.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Sure does! Everyone took our flyers, and Ayumu's live show was incredible, after all!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Did you know that the Nijigasaki girls have been trending a lot online lately, too? Ai's had a huge increase in followers.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: She even has a fan club now!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Ai already has a fan club?! It's really encouraging to be able to work together with up-and-coming idols, but we can't just sit back and let them take over now.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Indeed. We must give our utmost best efforts as well.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: By the way, is everyone free after this? Everyone seems pretty fired up right now so why don't we just go ahead and hold our regular meeting?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Let's do it! I wanna share what I felt today with everyone!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yup, yup! Let's hold our regular meeting and combine it with a celebration for a job well done!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay, could you head over to the clubroom first? I'll be right there after I finish packing up.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: You got it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh! Great job, Shioriko. I'm glad to see the school tour ended without a hitch. Your hard work really paid off.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: No, I must give you credit for at least half of this. Allow me to thank you once again.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Don't mention it. Today's success was due to the fact that you believed in all of us students.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: By the way, what did you think of Ayumu's live show? Is it okay to assume you really enjoyed it since you were leaning so far forward that people almost saw you?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes. It seems as though some girls gained an interest in this school after watching Uehara's performance, so I believe it was indeed a success.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Perhaps she... No, all of the club members have a mysterious power that draws people in.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: From now on, I will no longer outright refuse live performances at school events, though I will still scrutinize all the details. Do not forget your duty as students, however.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shioriko...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Now then, if you will excuse me.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wait a second.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: What is it?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shioriko, you should join us in our school idol activities!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Wha?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It didn't seem like you actually hated school idols when I watched you at practice. Didn't you have fun singing and dancing with everyone?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: While I appreciate the invitation, I must refuse. I do not think I am suited to being a school idol. I am suited to and love being the student president. I will focus on that.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Now then. I will excuse myself.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shioriko...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: She turned you down, huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Were you guys there that whole time?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Honestly. We were shocked that you suddenly invited her without consulting any of us!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Chuckle* I just got carried away. Sorry.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Don't be! It totally makes sense you invited her, given how everything went. Her first impression was pretty rotten, but Shio-ti's actually pretty fun.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I mean, it's not like I was against it or anything.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: She always practiced her heart out, and I was surprised at how quickly she memorized the dance moves.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: She even dropped by the clubroom yesterday to cheer Ayumu on, right? I can't Shiorikommend her enough after seeing how nice she can be.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Bahaha! Nice one, Kana!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Chuckle*

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: However, she still declined.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes, but she did not seem unimpressed upon receiving the invitation. She actually seemed happy.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Have Shioriko's misunderstandings about school idols been resolved?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Maybe. She even brought up performing live shows at school events.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: OHHHH MY GOSHHHHH!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wh-What is it?!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Wow, it just hit me as well.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: And me! If we can perform at school festivals and other events, that means... You're thinking what I'm thinking, right?!
